DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Effects Sucontral ( TM ) Mild Moderate Cases Diabetes Mellitus ( Type 2 )
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To evaluate long term effect aqueous-ethanolic extract bark Hintonia latiflora ( 1:4.5 , extraction medium 32 % ethanol ) mild moderate case type II diabetes , especially parameter glycaemic control safety . Research Design Methods : The trial carry controlled single-centre open study . 30 patient stably adjust diet treated study medication ( 3 x 2 ml/day meal ) 36 month . Efficacy parameter HbA1c fast postprandial serum glucose . As parameter safety , liver function test , cardiac function adverse event assess . Results : All three efficacy parameter improve significantly , parameter glycaemic control remain stable study duration 36 month . As compare baseline , 6 month 18 month therapy mean fasting glucose reduce 23.9 21.9 % ( 1.8 mmol 2.0 mmol absolute value ) . Mean postprandial glucose reduce 24.4 16.5 % ( 2.4 2.0 mmol absolute value ) , mean HbA1c decrease 10.4 12.4 % ( 0.76 1.04 % absolute figure ) . Improvement maintain 18 month . Tolerability excellent . No hypoglycaemic reaction occur . No adverse effect change cardiac liver function test observe . There tendency towards decrease triglyceride total cholesterol level .
